MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool AllowWhitespaceLiterals() cil managed

Docs.summary: Specifies whether white-space literals are allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to ignore white spaces in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
